languages.text: Wearer can move after their AoE attack and recieve additioal 4 MP once in turn.

traits.locale_text: Wearer can move after their AoE attack and recieve additioal 4 MP once in turn.

languages.text: After the wearer makes an area attack, they gain +4 MP and can continue their movement.

traits.locale_text: After the wearer makes an area attack, they gain +4 MP and can continue their movement.
After the wearer makes an area attack, they gain +4 MP and can continue their movement.

languages.text: Cuando el portador usa un ataque de área, gana inmediatamente +4 PM y puede seguir moviéndose.
languages.original_text: After the wearer makes an area attack, they gain +4 MP and can continue their movement.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador usa un ataque de área, gana inmediatamente +4 PM y puede seguir moviéndose.

languages.text: 使用者が範囲攻撃を行った後、MP +4を獲得し、移動を続けることができる。
languages.original_text: After the wearer makes an area attack, they gain +4 MP and can continue their movement.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が範囲攻撃を行った後、MP +4を獲得し、移動を続けることができる。

languages.text: 装备者进行范围攻击之后会获得4点移动点数，且可以在攻击后继续移动。
languages.original_text: After the wearer makes an area attack, they gain +4 MP and can continue their movement.

traits.locale_text: 装备者进行范围攻击之后会获得4点移动点数，且可以在攻击后继续移动。

languages.text: Après avoir effectué une attaque de zone, le porteur gagne +4 PD et peut continuer à se déplacer.
languages.original_text: After the wearer makes an area attack, they gain +4 MP and can continue their movement.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir effectué une attaque de zone, le porteur gagne +4 PD et peut continuer à se déplacer.

languages.text: Macht der Träger einen Flächenangriff, erhält er +4 BP und kann seine Bewegung fortsetzen.
languages.original_text: After the wearer makes an area attack, they gain +4 MP and can continue their movement.

traits.locale_text: Macht der Träger einen Flächenangriff, erhält er +4 BP und kann seine Bewegung fortsetzen.

languages.text: После совершения атаки по области персонаж получает +4 ОП и может продолжить движение.
languages.original_text: After the wearer makes an area attack, they gain +4 MP and can continue their movement.

traits.locale_text: После совершения атаки по области персонаж получает +4 ОП и может продолжить движение.
После совершения атаки по области персонаж получает +4 ОП и может продолжить движение.
